meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or disappointment.
meanings.sent1: Whups! I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Whups! I didn't expect to see you here.
meanings.sent3: Whups! I accidentally wore mismatched socks today.
meanings.sent4: Whups! My phone slipped out of my hand and fell into the pool.
meanings.sent5: Whups! The sudden rain ruined our picnic plans.

meanings.sent1: He whups the drum to make music.
meanings.sent2: She whups the rug to get rid of dust.
meanings.sent3: The chef whups the eggs to make a fluffy omelette.
meanings.sent4: The wind whups the flag against the pole.
meanings.sent5: The waves whups against the shore, creating a soothing sound.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: I whupsed the math problem and got the wrong answer.
meanings.sent2: She whupsed the recipe by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent3: He whupsed by wearing his shirt inside out.
meanings.sent4: The comedian whupsed his joke delivery and the audience didn't laugh.
meanings.sent5: The detective whupsed the suspect's alibi and found a contradiction.
